p: There is a diverse range of bacterial species that are frequently identified and isolated from mobile phones in both the health care and community settings. However, when compared to bacterial species, the range of fungi and viruses reported was not as extensive, which we believe is a consequence of researchers not looking for them, rather than them not being present. Of note, our research team has been investigating the presence of viral genomes on the surface of mobile phones with findings including human and animal viruses (manuscript in preparation).
